definition: one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)

sentences.english: A lantern on the boulevard cast a vague light into this poor room.
sentences.chinese: 路旁的一盏回光灯微微照着这里的贫苦相。

sentences.english: Go to Waypoint 4. You will find the cache right beside the path.
sentences.chinese: 到第四点，在小路旁就会发现宝盒。

sentences.english: It's not safe to travel by standing at the road side hoping to be picked up by passing motorists.
sentences.chinese: 旅行时站在路旁希望过路车捎带是不安全的。

sentences.english: She stands on the sidewalk chatting, and a police car cruises by.
sentences.chinese: 她站在路旁聊着，一辆警车开过来。

sentences.english: An Indian boy yawns as he washes plates at a roadside resturant.
sentences.chinese: 一个印度男孩在路旁的餐厅洗盘子时打呵欠。

sentences.english: He refused to see him, as he passed through on his return from the island of Elba.
sentences.chinese: 拿破仑从厄尔巴岛回来时，他拒绝到路旁去欢迎他。

sentences.english: There are many wild blackberry bushes along the road.
sentences.chinese: 路旁有许多野生的黑浆果灌木。

sentences.english: Let's pull into the lay-by and the have a rest.
sentences.chinese: 我们将车开进路旁停车处休息一下吧。

sentences.english: Dasan boarded the way I saw the street full of clear and bright flowers.
sentences.chinese: 在登上茶山的路上，我看见路旁到处是清明花。

sentences.english: The old lady was standing by the roadside , looking around worriedly .
sentences.chinese: 那位老太太站在路旁，担心地东张西望。

sentences.english: He found a skull of more than a hundred years exposing on the lawn.
sentences.chinese: 他在路旁的草丛中发现了一具髑髅，估计有上百年了。

sentences.english: While driving alone at night you see an old man hitch-hiking. What would you do?
sentences.chinese: 深夜开车回家时路旁老人要求搭便车，我怎么做？

sentences.english: I pulled off the road at a small pub.
sentences.chinese: 我把车子开到一家小酒馆并在路旁停下。

sentences.english: An old man sees a little boy sitting on a curb, crying.
sentences.chinese: 一位老人看见一个小男孩坐在路旁号啕大哭。

sentences.english: There were woods and few houses along the way.
sentences.chinese: 路旁是一片树林，还有零零星星的几所房子。

definition: Linpien township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Jiepang (Chinese location-based social networking service for mobile devices, in operation 2010-2016)
Huatan township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
decorative mass planting of flowers and shrubs, often bounded by a low masonry border, and often part of a streetscape
Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
